channel.title: [PI] Local Rsps Hosting
channel.description: How could I host my Rsps inside my house? I know about portforwarding and hamachi, and I know how to use them. But I was wondering if there was anyway to host my Rsps Local. Such as, inside my house only, or from across the street. I'm in the middle of BETA testing and would rather not put it online yet, only local. Is there anyway of doing this?

item.title: [PI] Local Rsps Hosting
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Or… you could just NOT tell anyone else your IP…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Local Rsps Hosting
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

127.0.0.1, gives you access, no one else. Or host on hamachi, you can set passwords.

Read full topic
